name: protocol-subgraphs
description: This package contains subgraphs of the Aave protocol v2 and v3

scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${NETWORK}-${VERSION}.json ./templates/${BLOCKCHAIN}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet-v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v3 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:goerli-v2: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=goerli env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-goerli env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:goerli-v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=goerli env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v3-goerli env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.prepare:manta: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=manta-pacific-mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:zksync: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=manta-zksync-era env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:mainnet-lrt: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:linea: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=linea env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:blast: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=blast env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
